Articles.Content:
Banned for not playing UNDERTALE. 

NeW PaGE! 

Edited February 23, 2022 by Abel101126
Banned because this is not the Undertale forum. (I have played UnderRail though.)
Banned because you only ASSUMED this was not the Undertale forum. It might be, though...
Banned for not realizing that this is not, in fact, a forum for anything other than Kerbal Space Program, regardless of the amount or type of Lounge games being played.
Banned for being another one of those people who do not see that there is more to this forum than KSP - like KSP2.
Banned for thinking Kerbal Space Program only applies to the first game.
Banned for thinking.
Banned for winking.
Banned for wrinkling my shirt
Banned by Henry Winkler.

Banned by Wallace Breen.[or wathev the name was]

Edited February 24, 2022 by Venusian Explorer
Banned for a post that makes no sense.

Banned for not being a London Boy

(and not showing me Hackney)

Banned because.

Sometimes you're better off Jeb
There's fun in your heart and it's pointing at your head
You think you're mad, too unstable
Kicking in chairs and knocking down tables
In a restaurant in a West End town
Call the police, there's a madman around
Running down underground to a dive bar
In a West End town

In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
West End girls

Too many shadows, whispering voices
Faces on posters, too many choices
If, when, why, what?
How much have you got?
Have you got it, do you get it, if so, how often?
And which do you choose, a hard or soft option?
(How much do you need?)

In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
West End girls
West End girls

(How much do you need?)

In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
Oooh West End town, a dead end world
East End boys, West End Girls
West End girls

You've got a heart of glass or a heart of stone
Just you wait 'til I get you home
We've got no future, we've got no past
Here today, built to last
In every city, in every nation
From Lake Geneva to the Finland station
(How far have you been?)

In a West End town, a dead end world
The East End boys and West End girls
A West End town, a dead end world
East End Boys, West End girls
West End girls

West End girls

West End girls
(How far have you been?)

Girls
East End boys
And West End girls
And West End girls
(... forever)
And West End girls
(How far have you been?)

East End boys
The West End girls
The West End boys
And West End girls

The West End girls
The West End boys
The West End girls

You have been formally banned for the following reasons

  • Very long message, most likely copy-pasted
  • Not being a London Boy and not liking someone's American Smile
  • You don't fancy anyone in the forums
  • Not showing me Hackney
  • Not being in the pubway
  • Not describing what a Heath is
  • No pictures of Camden Market provided
  • You didn't take me back to Highgate to meet your best mates
  • Etc.
Banned for Copyright Trolloolololololol.
Banned for trollollolololoolollolloilling
Banned for
Banned for whatever that last image was. Make it stop.
Banned for confusion

Banned for not knowing what that is.

That is @Venusian Explorerhimself. No, just kidding. It's his prime minister. The Trololololol goverment!

Th waht?

Banned for absurd miscalculations.
Banned for avoiding the truth

7 minutes ago, Kerbal Productions said:

Banned for avoiding the truth 

Banned!
Banned for the very notion of handling truths!
